name: Compton
shortDescription: A historically rich city known for its cultural contributions, community spirit, and evolving urban landscape.
fullDescription: Compton is a city in southern Los Angeles County known for its deep cultural roots, vibrant arts scene, and strong community identity. Despite challenges, the city has seen revitalization efforts focusing on public safety, education, and economic development. Compton offers diverse neighborhoods, parks, and cultural events that celebrate its heritage. It provides convenient access to Downtown LA and other surrounding cities, making it an important part of the region's urban fabric.
heroImageAlt: Street view in Compton with urban murals and community vibe

neighborhoods.name: Gardena
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city known for its diverse population and shopping districts.

neighborhoods.name: Carson
neighborhoods.description: City with a mix of residential and industrial areas, offering parks and local amenities.

neighborhoods.name: Long Beach
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city with a vibrant waterfront, cultural attractions, and diverse neighborhoods.

highlights.title: Compton College
highlights.description: Community college providing education and career opportunities to residents.

highlights.title: Dominguez Park
highlights.description: Large community park with sports fields, playgrounds, and picnic areas.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Open park space with trees and benches

highlights.title: Compton Creek Bike Path
highlights.description: Popular trail for biking, jogging, and outdoor recreation.

highlights.title: Historic Downtown
highlights.description: Area with murals, local businesses, and community events celebrating Compton's heritage.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Street art and shops in downtown Compton

faqs.question: What is Compton known for?
faqs.answer: Compton is known for its cultural heritage, music history, and community resilience.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Compton?
faqs.answer: The market is affordable compared to neighboring cities, with growing interest due to redevelopment efforts.

faqs.question: What can you do in Compton?
faqs.answer: Enjoy local parks, community events, cultural attractions, and explore the historic downtown murals.

faqs.question: How is commuting from Compton?
faqs.answer: Compton is served by several major freeways and Metro rail lines, offering easy access to Los Angeles and Long Beach.
